front.title: IEEE Recommended Practice for Marine Cable for Use on Shipboard and Fixed or Floating Facilities

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Requirements are given for single or multiconductor cables, with or without metal armor and/or jacket, and rated 300 V to 35 kV, intended to be installed aboard marine vessels, fixed and floating offshore facilities, and in accordance with industry installation standards and the regulations of the authorities having jurisdiction (AHJ).
